thread.title: Disgraced Lord Mandelson may think it fine to treat voters as an annoying irrelevance – but it is this contempt for democracy that led to the demand for Brexit
thread.title_full: Disgraced Lord Mandelson may think it fine to treat voters as an annoying irrelevance – but it is this contempt for democracy that led to the demand for Brexit

author: rbayne
title: Disgraced Lord Mandelson may think it fine to treat voters as an annoying irrelevance – but it is this contempt for democracy that led to the demand for Brexit
text:
Opinion THE SUN SAYS Disgraced Lord Mandelson may think it fine to treat voters as an annoying irrelevance – but it is this contempt for democracy that led to the demand for Brexit 
Britain has had enough of having the law laid down by unelected Eurofanatics like former PM Tony Blair Comment
